members.docComment:
/**
 * Exposes a component by combining it with additional configuration details.
 *
 * @template T - The type of the Angular component.
 *
 * @param component - The Angular component to be exposed.
 *
 * @param config - The configuration object for the component, excluding the component itself.
 *
 * @returns {ExposedComponent<T>} - An object representing the exposed component, including the component and its configuration.
 */
members.name: exposeComponent

docs.summary:
Exposes a component by combining it with additional configuration details.

@template T - The type of the Angular component.
docs.returns: {ExposedComponent<T>} - An object representing the exposed component, including the component and its configuration.

params.name: component
params.description: The Angular component to be exposed.

params.name: config
params.description: The configuration object for the component, excluding the component itself.
